Summary: Cart : User cannot delete item from cart by changing quantity to 0
Creator: Richard Kriheli
Description:
*Steps to reproduce:*

# Go to website url : [https://malathip.com/|https://malathip.com/|smart-link] 
# Go to shopping section
# Add any item to cart
# Go to cart
# Change quantity to 0

*Result:*

Item isn’t removed from cart - I get an error message/alert

!Screenshot 2024-12-06 at 6.24.21 PM.jpg|width=1008,height=418,alt="Screenshot 2024-12-06 at 6.24.21 PM.jpg"!

*Expected Result:*

Criteria suggests item should be removed from cart.
